name: strong-jaw

effect.sun-moon: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

short_effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves.
